body.p: FOP needs new logo and FOP Team decided to hold an open logo contest. We invite all members of the FOP community as well as any other interested parties to participate as contestants or by expressing your opinion through voting. We have set up Web Poll where you can see contestant logos and vote.

ul.li: Everyone can vote, but only FOP Team picks out the winner
The winner image is donated to Apache, but the authorship is preserved
The final result should be in SVG format
Deadline for submitting logos and voting: 28 February 2003

section.title: How to participate
section.p: Submit your image or link to it to fop-user mail list. Vote for a logo you like the most at FOP logo contest Web Poll.

section.title: Credits
section.p: We would like to thank Ant and POI teams for ideas how to make a logo contest.
